title: Some letters, containing an account of what seemed most remarkable in Switzerland, Italy, some parts of Germany, &c. in the years 1685 and 1686 written by G. Burnet, D.D. to the Hoble. R.B. ; to which is added, An appendix, containing some remarks on Switzerland and Italy, writ by a person of quality, and communicated to the author ; together with a table of the contents of each letter.
author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for the Widow Swart, Bookseller in the Beurs Stege,
